name: MONQ
description:
This is the first deployment for the Alpha of our game. It is still in development and we would love to hear your feedback.

MONQ is a third person, adventure platformer with puzzle elements, where you play as Flip the last monk of his order. To find your way through the game you must master control over time. In MONQ time comes in four forms:

Astronomical Time

Jump Thousands of years forward or backwards in time.

  • This can be useful for showing a level when it is in ruins and then when it was pristine.

Biological Time

Age biological beings forwards or backwards.

  • Useful for growing a sapling into a towering tree to reach the top of a wall or ledge.

Calendar Time

Change the seasons or day/night cycle.

  • Raise/Lower the tide or freeze a lake to cross them.

Delta Time

Slowing time.

  • Slow Down boulders or enemies.
